explains: v. 用球板（棒）击球；挥打，击走
wordGroup: off the bat 马上；立刻
bat around 详细讨论；到处游荡
blind as a bat [口语] 近乎全盲的；视力很差的，眼力不行的；鼠目寸光的；完全看不见东西的

sentences.en: I bolted the door the instant I saw the bat.
sentences.cn: 我一看到那只蝙蝠就把门闩上了。

sentences.en: The victim was clubbed to death with a baseball bat.
sentences.cn: 受害者被用棒球球棒殴打致死。

sentences.en: In Chinese folklore the bat is a symbol of good fortune.
sentences.cn: 在中国民间传说中，蝙蝠是好运的象征。
